pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Ultra Glued Gel 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

It's got to be got2b!
Defy gravity with the strongest got2b hold and keep your hair up as far as it will go with got2b ultra glued. This non-sticky formula allows plenty of style time so your hair won't freeze until you have pushed your style to the limit!

Squeeze into palms and distribute through your hair. Create any ultimate style and stand out from the crowd.

From volume & shine to hold & spikes, got2b offers the right styling products for your individual look. It's all about expressing your style - show off your personality, individuality & attitude with got2b brand! No matter what look you're going for, you can get it with got2b products. You got2b you!

Made in Australia.

Tube & Cap can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details. Push Your Styling to New Heights

Suitable For: all hair types

Size: 150mL

Hair Type: all hair types

KEY FEATURES

• For any ultimate style to stand out from the crowd
• Indestructible styling gel
• The strongest got2b hold 6
• No stickiness & no flakes
• You got2b you!

Warnings

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), PVP, Acrylates/Hydroxyesters Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin, Parfum, DMDM Hydantoin, Panthenol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl p-Cresol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, CI 60730 (Ext. Violet 2)

Active Ingredients: Aqua (Water), PVP, Acrylates/Hydroxyesters Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin, Parfum, DMDM Hydantoin, Panthenol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl p-Cresol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, CI 60730 (Ext. Violet 2)

Directions

Squeeze into palms and distribute through your hair. Create any ultimate style and stand out from the crowd.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
